issue.message: Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "executor", in androidx.media2.session.MediaBrowser.Builder.setControllerCallback) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "executor", in androidx.media2.session.MediaController.registerExtraCallback) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "executor", in androidx.media2.session.MediaController.Builder.setControllerCallback) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 3, "callbackExecutor", in androidx.media2.session.MediaLibraryService.MediaLibrarySession.Builder.Builder) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "executor", in androidx.media2.session.MediaSession.Builder.setSessionCallback) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
